article.title: Raytheon to Provide Digital Signature Capability
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Intelligence and Information Systems, Aurora, Colo., is being awarded a $12,099,527 contract modification to provide allowance of digital signatures of critical information exchanges and proof of message origin. The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
